channel.title: MF Beginner's Guide on aCurias Guides
channel.description: Recent content in MF Beginner's Guide on aCurias Guides

item.description: Combos & Mechanics # aa > Q > aa & Q2 # This clip shows 2 mechanics, firstly if you execute a minion with Double Up, the Double up bounce will critically strike.

item.title: Teamfights
item.description: Teamfights # 2v2 Teamfights # In a 2v2 fight, you should attempt to do the following:

item.title: Runes
item.description: Runes # Press The Attack # The is hands down the best keystone in an all-in fight, because Miss Fortune Kills faster with PTA than any other keystone, expecially in the early game

item.title: Summoner Spells
item.description: Summoner Spells # Exhaust # I strongly reccomend Exhaust as the go-to summoner spell for Miss Fortune in soloq, as Exhaust gives you the best chance of winning 1v1 fights.

item.title: Items
item.description: Items # Maw of Malmortius # In my opinion, Maw is an essential utility item that provides crucial counterplay against ranged AP burst damage, especially since it may be the sole option available.

item.title: Multipliers
item.description: Multipliers # This is a collection of how much Miss Fortune values the different types of damage multiplier effects in the game.

item.title: Getting S+
item.description: Getting S+ # One question that comes up too often is “How do I get S / S+ on Miss Fortune” The video above is a very boring game, where I get a S+ score.
